Home.Notre mission :: Our mission: eliminate empty returns. By implementing sustainable solutions such as our mobile app, freight consolidation, and electric mobility, we optimize transport efficiency while significantly reducing its carbon footprint.
Home.Met en relation les expéditeurs et les t: Connects shippers and carriers to save costs for shippers, increase carrier revenues, and reduce CO2 emissions into the environment.
Home.Trouvez votre transporteur fiable en moi: Find your reliable carrier in less than <mark>3 minutes</mark>
Home.Estimation des coûts immédiate grâce à l: Immediate cost estimation thanks to the Bidding feature
Home.Notifications instantanées des transport: Instant notifications of carriers matching your requests thanks to the Automatic Matching feature
Home.Contrôle total sur vos cargaisons à chaq: Full control over your cargo at every stage of the journey with real-time GPS tracking
Home.Un parcours clair et rapide : sélectionn: A clear and fast process: select an offer, bid, and load.
Home.Un matching intelligent pour trouver les: Smart matching to find loads suited to your routes and capacities.
Home.Une multitude de chargements disponibles: A multitude of available loads to reduce your empty trips.
Home.CloudFret s'engage envers la qualité et: CloudFret is committed to quality and continuous improvement, environmental protection and sustainable development, as well as workplace safety and health.

Green.Votre Partenaire pour des Solutions de T: Your Partner for Sustainable Transport Solutions
Green.La première solution de transport intra-: <mark>The first</mark> 100% electric <mark>intra-zone</mark> transport solution accessible to all

advantages-list.text: Electric mobility at the price of diesel

Green.Notre flotte 100% électrique est aliment: Our 100% electric fleet is powered by solar panels, ensuring a truly eco-friendly logistics solution capable of handling urgent, heavy, and dedicated deliveries, available 24/7 for maximum reliability.
Green.Nos superchargeurs sont installés dans d: Our superchargers are installed in strategic locations and powered by a high-capacity photovoltaic plant (2 megawatts), ensuring truly sustainable transport without relying on fossil fuel-based electricity.
Green.Cloudfret Green n'est pas seulement une: Cloudfret Green is not just a sustainable transport solution, but a tangible and measurable tool to help you achieve your environmental and tax goals while optimizing your operational costs.

benefits-list.text: Improvement of CSR reports with documented CO₂ savings

Green.Obtenez une estimation des économies de: Get an estimate of CO₂ savings

partners-list.text: A global leader in sustainable transport, Volvo supports Cloudfret Green with its high-performance electric trucks, ensuring a robust and reliable fleet for efficient and eco-friendly transport solutions within industrial zones.
A key player in Morocco's industrial development, MEDZ helps Cloudfret Green provide ideal infrastructure for sustainable transport solutions in free zones.

Fuel.Optimisée pour les besoins des petites e: Optimized for the needs of small and medium-sized transport companies, this offer is a comprehensive solution for managing fuel expenses while benefiting from exclusive advantages and extended payment conditions!
Fuel.Exclusivement conçue pour les petits et:
Exclusively designed for small and medium-sized transport partners of CloudFret. It is a key to increased efficiency, savings on every liter of fuel, and ultimately, a road to success.
If you are not yet a CloudFret partner, sign up now to unlock the exclusive benefits reserved for our community!

steps-list.title: Selection and Activation

faq-list.question: Who can benefit from the CloudFret Fuel Offer?
faq-list.answer:
This offer is exclusively available for small and medium-sized transport partners of CloudFret.
If you are not yet a partner, we invite you to sign up now to take advantage of our offers.

faq-list.question: What are the main benefits of the CloudFret Fuel Offer?
faq-list.answer: Offer beneficiaries enjoy fuel discounts and an extended payment period of up to 60 days for optimized financial management.

faq-list.question: How can I be eligible for the CloudFret Fuel Offer?
faq-list.answer: Registration is simple and intuitive via the CloudFret app. Follow the instructions to strengthen your eligibility and join our network of transport partners.

faq-list.question: How does the CloudFret Fuel Offer contribute to sustainability?
faq-list.answer: We actively support transporters in optimizing their resources, anchoring our efforts in a vision of sustainability and digital innovation.

faq-list.question: Are there any fees associated with using the CloudFret Fuel Offer?
faq-list.answer: Obtaining the offer is free of charge. Our goal is to provide an accessible and advantageous solution for our transport partners, with no hidden costs.

faq-list.question: In case of a problem or question, how can I contact support?
faq-list.answer: Our support team is available to assist you. You can contact us via our website or by phone at the number provided on our contact platform.
